entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:41 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023
